name: Sharareh Alipour
content: Sharareh Alipour [email protected] Assistant Professor Bio Sharareh Alipour received her B.Sc., M.Sc. and Ph.D. from Sharif University, Iran, in 2009, 2011 and 2016, respectively. She was a postdoc at Institute for Research in Fundamental Sciences (IPM) and Institute of Science and Technology, Austria (ISTA). Download CV Research Interests Theoretical Computer Science Algorithm Design Distributed and Sublinear Algorithms Data Mining Graph Theory and Combinatorics Education Research Teaching Ph.D. Computer Engineering(2011-2016), Sharif University of Technology M.Sc.
